1067151496481918978.text: Regarding the landing site: don't expect gorgeous, sweeping views of Mars. InSight landed on "Elysium Planitia," which translates to "heavenly plain."  It was chosen to be as flat as possible to make the landing safe and drilling easier.

After losing his job, Frank’s marriage was on the rocks

He was unemployed for MONTHS until the Parks Department hired him as one of those leaf-blower guys

He returned home to his wife and kids, beaming.



"TODAY, AT THE PARK," he said, “I GOT A BLOWJOB!!!”

At a party, I begin to tell a story but the intended recipient is distracted

I chirp at him: thank u, momma bird, thank u
